alert.note: Alert for Forrest; Lamar (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 11 at 6:09PM CDT until May 11 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Forrest County in southeastern Mississippi... Lamar County in southeastern Mississippi... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 609 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Rawls Springs, or near Hattiesburg, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hattiesburg, Petal, West Hattiesburg, Purvis, Oak Grove, Sumrall, Rawls Springs, Baxterville, Pine Ridge, Sunrise, Macedonia and Corinth. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for south central and southeastern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
